description:
Employer Industry: Networking Solutions

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Competitive salary up to [highest pay]
- Opportunity for career advancement and growth within the organization
- Chance to work with cutting-edge technology in the field of Software Defined Cloud Networking
- Collaborative and results-oriented work environment
- Chance to develop relationships with key personnel in Fortune 500 accounts
- Potential for travel to customers and regional partners within the territory

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Consultative selling and solution development for large enterprise customers
- Identification, development, and closure of sales opportunities across the Arista product portfolio
- Establishing professional relationships with key personnel in assigned agencies
- Creating and executing targeted account plans with partner managers and sales engineering team
- Managing and aligning business priorities across a named account territory

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Bachelor's Degree (BA/BS, CS, BBA) or equivalent
- Minimum of 10+ years of Sales experience with a focus on Fortune 500 customers
- Demonstrated leadership skills to lead cross-functional teams and external partners
- Proven navigation of End User requirements definition through contracting and resale processes
- Working knowledge of networking, data center, and/or network automation solutions
- Exceptional people skills and ability to cultivate and maintain relationships at all levels
- Proven track record of building business plans and exceeding sales targets
- Willingness to travel to customers and regional partners within the territory

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Experience in networking solutions such as Route, Switch, SDN, SD-WAN, Campus Networks, Network Virtualization, NFV
- Familiarity with software-defined cloud networking and network automation
